title: Honyek
author: Honyek
content: l have been into bitcoin for a while now, buying and selling bitcoin, in addition to working in some sites, posting, air views, and earning reasonable amount of bitcoin. Recently, it's like some of those sites have closed down, while the remaining ones are paying little or no bitcoin. Can anyone tell me some trustworthy sites, where someone can work and earn reasonable amount of bitcoin?

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: I don't quite know what you mean but you are on a forum where if you make positive contributions, rank up and are honest you can earn money for posting. I don't know how much you were earning before or exactly what work you were doing but if you enjoy posting you can get a nice bonus for doing it here.You can check out the Services section to see what's on offer and what the pay is. For Hero/Legendary $100 a week is average I would say, and if you are one of the more exceptional contributors between $200 and $250, although there are a select few who earn even more but for that you have to be in the top ten of the forum, and I would say top five.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: When you can start to post something informative and educative on this forum. You can learn how this forum is, learn more about bitcoin and rank up and start earning little amount of bitcoin without working than to be posting. All you just have to do is to join a signature campaign and continue to have fun like you are on social media or chat app like Whatapp, but with helpful posts.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Noticing your dissatisfaction, it seems that you're demanding a minimum payment for a certain period. You should at least position yourself in the team of a crypto company for decent and stable payments, eg (according to your preferences) you should work as a marketer. There are several aggregators of career vacancies in the crypto field such as crypto.jobs that you can try to browse. If you're professional enough, you can determine your own payment method, for example with bitcoin.

The only site that can help you to earn some good amount Bitcoin is this forum because in this forum anyone who contributes information and stuff and ranks up to full member or above rank member can generate some amount of Bitcoin by applying avatars or signatures on his/her profile.You can also earn some Bitcoin if you have services that you can offer on this forum. For that kind of service you'll have to go to services board and create your thread there. Sometimes there are other tasks that could also help you to earn some Bitcoin on this forum. You can also participate in contests, free raffles, games and rounds to generate some bitcoin from this forum. If you're a hard working person and you give your best to your work then this forum is the place for you.Many members of the forum are earning substantial income from the signature and avatar campaigns of this forum, but in order to avail those opportunities you will have to rank up to at least full member rank. Once again if you're hard working and at the same time you can contribute good information to the forum then surely you can reach that rank within 4 months.

comments.body: Quote from: Honyek on August 29, 2023, 01:26:06 PM Recently, it's like some of those sites have closed down, while the remaining ones are paying little or no bitcoin. Some of these sites where you could get bitcoins for free have closed down because the plan to continue giving out free bitcoins to people is not sustainable, and the owners of these sites need bitcoins now more than before because of how more valuable it is becoming. If one forum member is able to refer you to one of these kinds of sites, it will not also take long before they will shut down too, because bitcoin will be more valuable next year than it is this year.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: I thought you were going to mention some, but instead you are asking for yourself. Well, the thing is, I do not have any experience with any other sites. But if you wanted to earn in BTC, then BTT is the best place for you. Because it is filled with many services and tasks that one could do to earn BTC. There are many faucets available too, but those are for those who have a lot of followers, because in my experience, only those with a huge fan following could earn a decent amount from faucets.Well, besides faucets, you can earn by joining signature, contest, and review campaigns in the service section. You could also provide your own skills in exchange for BTC as a a payment method.PS: I do not know about any other site other than BTT.

comments.body: Yeah I agree with people, here is the best place you can do that, there are earnings as high as 400$ a month, which is minimum wage in our country give or take, and all you do is like post 5 messages a day here, not even that much a bit less. comments.author: ZAINmalik75
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on August 29, 2023, 01:49:33 PMWhen you can start to post something informative and educative on this forum. All you just have to do is to join a signature campaign and continue to have fun like you are on social media or chat app like Whatapp, but with helpful posts.That's great advice. As I have seen many members here joining just to earn money and making posts that are of no use or value, I am not criticising anyone; instead, I am just trying to shed some light on the statement that you made. If you decide to earn from signatures, then you should not take posting as a task but instead post like you talk on WhatsApp or any other social media app.Now a days, people are wasting a lot of time on Snapchat, and in my opinion, other than that, they should spend their time here because they will learn new things here, and new things always open doors to earnings.OP should take this forum as a discussion forum, join the discussions, share useful insights, and get ranked. If he is eligible for competition, he will be given a chance, but that's also not for sure. I mean, we should not just rekindle someone's hope that he will definitely earn; instead, achievements and valuable insights are also necessary. But OP could earn from bounties, but the drawback is that they do not pay in BTC but instead in shit coins. But Op could join contests or review campaigns, just like the recent campaign run by Royse, where people earned more than 90 dollars.

comments.body: I believe there are a lot opportunities that could make you earn Bitcoin, but it's important to possess the necessary skills and engage in freelance work online whether on this forum or other platforms.There's a lot of services that everyone could offer for money, You have the option to sell items or offer services like designing or coding for Bitcoin. Additionally, engaging in signature campaigns on forums after achieving a certain rank is also a possibility to earn some bitcoin. I mean I don't know exactly how much bitcoin you used to earn but if you spend a lot of time in here and use your skills you can obviously make a good money.
